strings.Value: "Thank you. I'll be expecting your future creations."
"I would like to order a specific item."
"Your services are no longer needed."
"A set of magic scrolls."
"Wand."
"Rod."
"Staff."
"I changed my mind. Do as you wish."
"Of course!"
"No, Irlene, your regular deliveries are enough."
"Remind me, who are you and what are you working on?"
{n}{d|Irlena}Irlene{/d} bows.{/n} "Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! Allow me to alleviate your daily concerns with a humble gift from your admirer!"
"I am certain that you or one of your friends will find this... trinket useful. It's come a long way to get to your hands."
"I'd like to take this opportunity to thank you once again, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}, for your kind generosity. I have another... appealing offer for you."
{n}Irlene pales.{/n} "But... have I done something to insult you? Well, I suppose it's up to you. I won't trouble you again... But this was quite an unexpected rejection."
{n}Irlene breaks into a smile.{/n} "I won't keep you waiting."
"My quality for your money! What would you like?"
"Whatever you say!"

{n}Irlene starts twisting her hair around her finger.{/n} "My range of goods is wide enough, no doubt. But just for you, I can get something exquisite... One of my partners may have come across something valuable and rare. However, I'll need your help to deliver it to you. Are you interested?"
{n}Irlene claps.{/n} "Come to my shop, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}, so we can talk more in private."
"That's a shame. If you change your mind, you're welcome to visit my shop to discuss the matter in private."

"There is something else. My partner finally managed to send the article I promised. Now I just need to arrange its delivery. If you want your trophy, please, do not disturb my work. Allow me to do my job, and you'll have it very soon!"

{n}{d|Irlena}Irlene{/d} bows deeply and hands you a package.{/n} "Here you are, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. Please, accept this gift as a token of my special respect and admiration. I swear, any concerns you had while it was en route will be repaid!"

"I'm Irlene, the smartest dealer in magical items in all the Stolen Lands! With my connections I can find almost anything – rare spell scrolls, wands and staffs. I've got a lead on one truly unique artifact – a rod that can empower over any spell, and surpassed resistance to any magic! It won't be easy to get our hands on this thing, but I'll do my best."
